Name: The Bond
About the game: The Bond is a visually stunning VR short about an ancient healer and her connection with all living things - good or evil. Far away, in an alien forest, a TiaMuati and her faithful beast seek out a sacred glade. Here she can connect with the web of life - and see the world through other’s eyes. But there’s an imbalance - a dark presence. As the forest's guardian she must confront it... and you're coming with her. Directed by Olly Reid Created by Axis Studios
Meta Title: The Bond: Oct 30, 2018, Axis Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Bond? Check out the release date (Oct 30, 2018), developer insights from Axis Studios, and a complete game summary.
